title: Brain Drill - Discography
description:
Ever hear a song and feel like you&#039;re about to shit your pants, blow a load, and have blood shoot out your nose at the exact same time?  Well now you can.  This is Brain Drill, and they are awesome.  They are brutal, Extreme Technical Death Metal.  This is their EP and then the album following it.  They&#039;re the same songs, changed around a little bit.  Who gives a fuck.  If you like the really brutal shit, download them... they are gods... and currently looking for a drummer.


Brain Drill

The Parasites - 2006
